name: Last Few Seconds
description:
Xbox 360 or Xbox One Controller Required

Story

Moving through the wasteland that is now Earth, the last surviving forward unit is trying to make it's way to the rendezvous location. With the enemy approaching, there is no choice but to set up camp and defend as long as possible.

How long can they survive?

Be Part of The Fight

Control the battlefield from two perspectives.

  • RTS: Strategically move units to defend locations
  • FPS: Move into any unit to control them for better accuracy and rate of fire
Time

Bend time to your advantage to revive and heal units, while also getting a couple extra seconds to react

  • RTS: Create areas of rewind time to heal your units and defenses or to bring them back to life. Halt enemy advances by making them go back from whence they came.
  • FPS: Go into bullet time to get those much needed extra seconds to think and react.
Modes

Play Mode - Limited Resources
Sandbox Mode - Get as many units as the heart desires
